chdsw.philips.com.haraldlib

Class HBDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCallback
      • chdsw.philips.com.haraldlib.HBDevice

  • public class HBDevice
extends android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCallback
    Represents a remote Bluetooth device. A HBDevice lets you create a connection with the device or query information about it. This class is a wrapper around the BluetoothDevice.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HBDevice

        public HBDevice(android.content.Context context,
                android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device,
                java.util.UUID primaryServiceUUID,
                java.util.Map<java.util.UUID,HBServiceHandler> supportedServices,
                HBDeviceListener listener)
        Constructs a new device wrapper around device.
        Parameters:
        context - Android application environment.
        device - Wrapped Android bluetooth device.
        primaryServiceUUID - Primary UUID of the device.
        supportedServices - Supported services by HBCentral.
        listener - Callback to HBCentral.

        Connect with the bluetooth device.

      • getPrimaryService

        public java.util.UUID getPrimaryService()

      • getServices

        public java.util.List<java.util.UUID> getServices()
        Get the services supported by the connected bluetooth device. Only services that are also supported by HBCentral are included.
        Returns:
        Supported device services.

      • supportsService

        public boolean supportsService(java.util.UUID serviceUUID)
        Get the support for a specific service by the device Only services that are also supported by HBCentral are included.
        Returns:
        Supported for specific service.

      • getState

        public HBDevice.State getState()

      • readCharacteristic

        public void readCharacteristic(HBReadCommand command)
        Read a characteristic of the connected device. The command contains information about the service and characteristic to read.
        Parameters:
        command - Specifies which service and characteristic to read.

      • writeCharacteristic

        public void writeCharacteristic(HBWriteCommand command)
        Write a value of a characteristic of the connected device The command contains information about the service, characteristic and value to write.
        Parameters:
        command - Specifies which service, characteristic and value to write.

      • checkSubscribeQueue

        private void checkSubscribeQueue()
        Execute the next command in the subscribe queue. A queue is used because the calls have to be executed sequentially. If the read or write fails, the next command in the queue is executed.

      • checkReadWriteQueue

        private void checkReadWriteQueue()
        Execute the next command in the read write queue. A read or write is executed based on the command type. A queue is used because the calls have to be executed sequentially. If the read or write fails, the next command in the queue is executed.
